nodes.text: PT04 was the designation of a DUM-series pit droid. PT04 was one of several pit droids owned by the Toydarian junk dealer Watto, who offered the droid for sale along with its counterparts, PT02 and PT03, around 32 BBY. Most of the potential buyers were Podracer pilots. Watto priced each of his pit droids at 1,000 truguts, selling them from his shop on the planet of Tatooine. PT04 was tan in color, and had a black colored shape on his torso.

PT04 and his counterparts first appeared in the 1999 video game Star Wars Episode I: Racer, where they cold be purchased by the player. The pit droids were used for repairing damaged parts on the player's Podracer. Damaged parts were repaired after the player successfully completed a newly unlocked course or a course that they hadn't beaten before.
